title: Verify Prometheus data source query successful

blocks.title: Verify Prometheus data source query successful

blocks.content: As the final step in your journey, complete the following steps to confirm that you've successfully connected to the Prometheus data source:
In the Grafana side menu, expand the **Drilldown** section by clicking the caret.
If you see a **Let's start!** button, click it.

You should see Prometheus metrics displayed in the Grafana Drilldown Metrics app.
